member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode
member.summary: Base of GSplit, GContentNode (GPanel and GTab) and GDummyNode.

member.name: P:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode.IsDocked
member.summary: Returns true if is docked in main window or in a floating tab. .

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode
member.summary: Base of GPanel and GTab.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.HitTestCaption(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if x/y is in caption and this is visible and is a child of parent. For tabbed GPanel returns true only if x/y is in its tab button, unless there are no visible siblings. For GTab returns true even if on a tab button.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.Show
member.summary: Shows in the most recent visible state. Activates tab group panel.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.Hide
member.summary: Hides, does not close.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.DockBy(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode,G.Controls.GDockPanel.DockSide)
member.summary: Docks this GPanel or GTab in an existing or new GTab or GSplit. If need, creates new GTab or GSplit in gcTarget place and adds gcTarget and this to it. Else reorders if need. This can be a new GPanel, with null ParentSplit and ParentTab, dock state not Docked.
member.param: New sibling GPanel (side can be any) or sibling GTab (when side is SplitX) or parent GTab (when side is TabX).
Specifies whether to add on a GTab or GSplit, and at which side of gcTarget.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat
member.summary: Floating parent form of a GPanel.

member.name: P:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.ShowWithoutActivation
member.summary: 1. Prevents activating window when showing. 2. Allows to show ToolTip for inactive window.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator
member.summary: Calculates and shows transparent rectangles where the floating panel can be docked when dragging it.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._OnFloatMoved(Catkeys.POINT,Catkeys.RECT@,Catkeys.RECT@)
member.summary: Everything is in _manager client area.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._CalcDockRectPart(Catkeys.RECT,Catkeys.POINT)
member.summary: Returns the left, top, right or bottom half of r, depending on where p is in it. Sets _target.side.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._CalcNewTabButtonRectInFullCaption(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel,Catkeys.RECT,Catkeys.POINT)
member.summary: Returns a half of r (gp full caption, not just tab button), depending on where p is (even if not in r). Sets _target.side.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget
member.summary: GFloat.Drag() and _DockIndicator.OnFloatDropped() return this if can be docked.

member.name: F:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget.gc
member.summary: The target. Note: when dockAsTab is true, it currently may be tabbed or not; if tabbed, may be docked or not.

member.name: F:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget.side
member.summary: Specifies whether to add on a GTab or GSplit, and at which side of gc.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel
member.summary: Contains single Control.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel.#ctor(G.Controls.GDockPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit,System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: This ctor is used at startup, when adding from XML.

member.name: P:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel.PreferredCaptionHorzVert
member.summary: Returns 1 if caption should be horizontal, 2 if vertical, 0 if any.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel.IsReallyVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if this isn't hidden and isn't in a hidden tab group.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.Create(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.ImageList,System.Windows.Forms.Control[])
member.summary: Loads UI layout from XML file and adds controls (panels, toolbars) to this control. Adjusts control properties and positions everything according to the XML.
member.param: XML file containing panel/toolbar layout. Used to load and save. If missing, will load Folders.ThisApp + Path.GetFileName(xmlFile) and save to xmlFile.
ImageList containing panel icons that are displayed when tabbed panel button is too small to display text.
Controls. Control Name must match the XML element (panel) name attribute in the XML.

member.name: P:G.Controls.GDockPanel._HitTestData.ParentTab
member.summary: If hit test on a tabbed GPanel, returns its parent GTab, else null.

member.name: P:G.Controls.GDockPanel._HitTestData.ContentNode
member.summary: If hit test on a GContentNode, returns it, else null.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel._HitTest(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32,System.Int32,G.Controls.GDockPanel._HitTestData@)
member.summary: If hit-test on a splitter, sets ht.gs and returns _HitTestResult.Splitter. Else if on a GPanel caption or GPanel tab button, sets gp and returns _HitTestResult.Caption. Else (if on a GTab caption but not a GPanel tab button) sets gt and returns _HitTestResult.Caption.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.FindPanel(System.String)
member.summary: Gets control by name. Returns null if not found.

member.summary: Hides the panel, but does not close.

member.summary: Hides the panel, but does not close.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.ShowPanel(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Shows the panel in the most recent state (docked or floating) and activates tabbed panel if need.

member.summary: Shows the panel in the most recent state (docked or floating) and activates tabbed panel if need.

member.summary: Returns true if the panel is visible (docked or floating).

member.summary: Returns true if the panel is visible (docked or floating).

member.summary: Changes panel caption (or tab button) text.

member.summary: Changes panel tooltip text.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.AddShowPanelsToMenu(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds menu items for all panels or toolbars, except the doc panel, to a menu. On menu item click will show that panel.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.EnableDisableAllFloatingWindows(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this in main window's WndProc override on WM_ENABLE.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GDockPanelEventArgs
member.summary: Used with many GDockPanel events and othe callbacks.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GDockPanelEventArgs.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: ctor.
member.param: Must be GPanel. We use object because C# compiler does not allow to use GPanel (less accessible).

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GDockPanelEventHandler`1
member.summary: Used with many GDockPanel events and other callbacks.

member.name: E:G.Controls.GDockPanel.PanelContextMenu
member.summary: Before showing the context menu when the user right-clicks a panel tab button or caption. The event handler can add/remove/etc menu items.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit
member.summary: Contains 2 GNode (GPanel, GTab, GSplit or GDummyNode) and a splitter.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.#ctor(G.Controls.GDockPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit,System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: This ctor is used at startup, when adding from XML.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.#ctor(G.Controls.GDockPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This ctor is used when a floating GContentNode dropped on a docked GContentNode. child1 or child2 must be docked, but not both.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.OnChildRemoved(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode)
member.summary: Puts gn sibling in parent split of this, in place of this. Makes this invalid and removes from _aSplit. Does not update layout.
member.param: One of children. The caller is removing it from this.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.ReplaceChild(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode)
member.summary: Replaces child gnOld with gnNew. Sets gnNew.ParentSplit = this.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.RepositionChild(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes IsVerticalSplit, Child1 and Child2 if need. Does not update layout.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.DragSplitter
member.summary: Called on mouse left button down on splitter. Returns when the drag operation ends.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.Paint(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Called from GDockPanel.OnPaint, for its _firstSplit. Paints all descendants.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.SetChildFixedSize(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a child (of this, or of an ancestor if need) to have fixed width or height. Used for context menu.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit.IsChildFixedSize(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets whether a child (of this, or of an ancestor if need) has fixed width or height. Used for context menu.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab
member.summary: Contains multiple GPanel.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab.#ctor(G.Controls.GDockPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit,System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: This ctor is used at startup, when adding from XML.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab.#ctor(G.Controls.GDockPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GSplit,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel)
member.summary: This ctor is used when a floating GPanel dropped on a docked non-tabbed GPanel caption. item1 or item2 must be docked, but not both.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab._CalcButtonsBounds(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Returns buttons width.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab.SetActiveItem(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel)
member.summary: Sets ActiveItem, shows its contents, hides previous ActiveItem contents, invalidate caption, calls DockedDocumentPanelActivated event.
member.param: Can be null to deactivate all.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab.OnItemRemoved(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel)
member.summary: Removes a child panel from Items. If single item left, moves it to this parent and invalidates/removes this.

member.name: M:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GTab.AddOrReorderItem(G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel,G.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: If gp is child of this, moves it to the place before or after target (a child of this). Else just inserts gp there. If target is null, adds to the end (does nothing if gp is child). Does not update layout.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GAccContainer
member.summary: Used by GDockPanel and GFloat.

member.name: T:G.Controls.GDockPanel.GAccNode
member.summary: AccessibleObject of GNode. We use separate class (don't inherit GNode from AccessibleObject) to avoid GNode cluttering and conflicts (Name, Bounds etc).
